pullRequest.title: TDI-43935 : MsSQLRow NString type for prepared statement
pullRequest.bodyText:
https://jira.talendforge.org/browse/TDI-43935
What is the current behavior? (You can also link to an open issue here)
MsSQLDbRow does not support NString as prepared statement parameter type
What is the new behavior?
NString is added in supported types list

commit.message: TDI-43935 : MsSQLRow NString type for prepared statement

nodes.bodyText: Strange, this lis is a java type list. NString is a SQL type.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -298,6 +298,7 @@
         		<ITEM NAME="Object" 		VALUE="Object"/>
         		<ITEM NAME="Short" 			VALUE="Short"/>
         		<ITEM NAME="String" 		VALUE="String"/>
+                <ITEM NAME="NString"        VALUE="NString"/>

nodes.bodyText:
